 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַט‎</span>] **verb** ==let drop== (Late Hebrew ***id., loosen, detach, draw away***, Niph\`al ***slip off***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁמַטּ‎</span> ***loosen, pull away***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***draw*** sword, ***draw*** or ***pull away***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; is ***hang, suspend, II. release*** debtor ([[BDB#Kam|Kam]]), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***string*** of pearls); — 

**Qal** ***let drop, fall***: ***Imperative*** masculine plural suffix + ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁמְטוּהָ‎</span> (final <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ו‎</span> dittograph) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁמְטוּהָו‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.33|2Kgs 9:33]] he said, ***Let her fall, and they let her fall***; then figurative, of letting land rest in seventh year:, 2 masculine singular suffix: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁמְטֶנָּה‎</span> [[Exod.23.11|Exod 23:11]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁמַטְתָּ֫ה‎</span>&gt; [[Jer.17.4|Jer 17:4]] ***thou shalt let drop*** thy hand (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָָֽרְךָ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבְךְ‎</span> [[BDB#JDMich|JDMich]] and modern) from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>) thine inheritance, i.e. abandon it; ***Infinitive abs***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמוֺט‎</span> [[Deut.15.2|Deut 15:2]] ***let fall*** (a debt in seventh year; see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשֶּׁה‎</span> b). — Perfect 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׁמְטוּ הַבָּקָר‎</span> [[2Sam.6.6|2Sam 6:6]]= [[1Chr.13.9|1Chr 13:9]] is dubious, most naturally either ***they let the oxen fall*** (slip, stumble), or (as Targan) ***the oxen let it fall*** (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמָטוֺ‎</span>, that is, the ark); &gt; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] the ***oxen ran away***; [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] ***slipped*** (the yoke)? see further [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁמְטוּ‎</span> [[Ps.141.6|Ps 141:6]] their judges ***have been thrown down***. **Hiph\`il** 2 masculine singular (?) jussive (?) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשְׁמֵט‎</span> [[Deut.15.3|Deut 15:3]] ***thou, shalt cause*** thy hand ***to let drop***, etc.; [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 147</sup> **Qal**; &lt; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁמֹט‎</span> (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֶ֑ךָ‎</span>: subject
